channel.title: Studies in Hispanic and Lusophone Linguistics
channel.description: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Studies in Hispanic and Lusophone Linguistics

item.description: Article by Olga Tararova, Gabriela Martinez Loyola, Martha Black, Nadav Benjamin, Qiyao Wang DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/shll-2024-2010

item.title: First things third? The extension of canonically third-person singular inflections to first-person singular subjects in adult heritage Spanish

item.title: Gender agreement among Russian learners of Spanish in an instructed versus naturalistic learning environment
